actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Alcoholism and Drug Abuse.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Alcoholism and Drug Abuse

official_title: A bill to establish the position of Associate Director for Minority Concerns in the National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Comprehensive Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism Prevention, Treatment, and Rehabilitation Act of 1970 to establish the position of Associate Director for Minority Concerns within the National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism. Requires such Associate Director to develop policies and programs to assure increased emphasis on the alcohol and alcohol-related needs of minority populations.

titles.title: A bill to establish the position of Associate Director for Minority Concerns in the National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism.
